body: An introduction covering several fundamental areas of modern optics, optical PROCESSES, AND DEVICES.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 320: Introduction to Electro-Optical Engineering
